name: Naval Raid
description:
Naval Raid is a physics based, atmospheric naval battle game. Your purpose as a pirate is to sink all the navy ships before they reach safe waters. You have 10 minutes to get rid of all the fleet otherwise they will be able to transfer trade goods to the city and you will lose.

This is a game I made for fun during my spare time this month. Also this is the first game I made for itch.io. I plan to release one game from different genres every month.

Enjoy!
